subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: TNT has announced that it will not renew its estimated seven-year, $30 million deal with the British Open after the 2009 tournament in Turnberry, Scotland. ESPN immediately became the overwhelming favorite to acquire TNT’s early-round rights and take over third- and fourth-round coverage from ABC Sports.
